description:
Crisp fall days, the sudden cold that hits when the sun falls below the ridgeline, every day in winter – this is the fleece you reach for. Made with Alpenex II™ fleece – a 100% recycled polyester – The Covert’s thermally efficient, soft, and breathable. The tall collar ups the warmth, articulated patterning gives you freedom to move, and the deep front zip ventilates and makes pulling it on and off easy. This is your go-to – midlayer or standalone – across a range of conditions and seasons.

Updated fabric made with 100% recycled polyester.
name: Arcteryx Covert 1/2 Zip - Mens

specs.value: Alpenex II™ - 100% Recycled Polyester - bluesign Approved Material
